basic.description: This course covers the theory of hierarchical state machines (HSM) and the use of HSM to model and implement reactive systems (RS). Implementations of HSM in C, C++, and Java are explored. HSM are applied for modeling and implementing RS, including real-time, multi-threaded, and embedded systems. Selected articles from the rapidly expanding literature and an advanced project are included. Permission of instructor required for students with credit for CEN 4xxx.
basic.subject: COP
basic.title: Reactive Systems and Hierarchical State Machines
